goal.core.program.actions

Class MentalAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.parser.ParsedObject
      • goal.core.program.actions.Action
        • goal.core.program.actions.MentalAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IParsedObject, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ParsedObject>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdoptAction, DeleteAction, DropAction, InsertAction, SendAction

    public abstract class MentalAction
extends Action
    Parent class for all actions that *only* modify the MentalState of an agent and do *not* have external side effects outside the multi-agent system itself.

    A mental action has a Selector that indicates the agent whose mental model is affected, or the agent(s) to whom a message should be sent.

    The mental actions include:

    • The adopt action AdoptAction
    • The adoptone action AdoptOneAction
    • The drop action DropAction
    • The insert action InsertAction
    • The delete action DeleteAction
    • The send action SendAction
    • The sendonce action SendOnceAction

    Author:
    N.Kraayenbrink
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • MentalAction

        protected MentalAction(java.lang.String name,
            Selector selector,
            InputStreamPosition source)
        Creates a new MentalAction.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the action.
        selector - The selector indicating on which mental model(s) this action should be executed. Can be null, in which case 'this' is assumed.
        source - The source code location of this action, if available; null otherwise.
